ygData.subject: Fw: tinkering recipes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Garett  To:  Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 3:52 PM Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] tinkering recipes ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Garett <osmosis@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 3:52 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] tinkering recipes


> Fireworks = Firewater + Batwing + Metal Shaft
> Animated Bait = Cork + Spriket
> Collapsable Fishing Pole = Metal Rod + Metal Rod + Metal Rod + Gnomish
Bolt
> Mechanical Lockpicks = Gear + Sprocket + Lockpick Set + Rat Ear
> Compass = Pietin + Skewer + Water Flask + Static Orb + Cork
> Stalking Probe = Gear + Gear + Bottle + Metal Rod + Firewater
> Spyglass = Collapsable Fishing Pole + Bottle + Twine + Metal Rod +
> Reflective Shard
> Aqualulng = Fine Steel Coral Mesh + Silk Lined Stell Helm + Metal Twine +
> Gnomish Bolt + Metal Rod + Fresh Fish
> Rebreather = Aqualung + Lime Coated Meshing + Sharkskin Tubing + Medium
> Platemail Helm + Firewater + Metal Fastening
> Gemcutter = Metal Rod + Diamond Dust + Cam + Metal Fastening + Firewater +
> Grease (Not sure if this is the correct formula)
>
> I believe that this list is <roughly> in order of easiest to hardest.
Good
> Luck!
>
> Cogg - Rallos Zek (30)
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sonny Nguyen <snguyen@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 1:01 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] tinkering recipes
